meanings.definition: To move in a circular or elliptical motion.
meanings.sent1: The toy top was nutating on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The planets nutate around the sun in their orbits.
meanings.sent3: The dancer nutated gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent4: The fan nutated slowly, spreading cool air throughout the room.
meanings.sent5: The windmill nutated in the breeze, generating electricity.
meanings.sent6: Children love to watch tops nutating.
meanings.sent7: The nutating sprinkler watered the garden evenly.
meanings.sent8: The nutating satellite captured images of the Earth.
meanings.sent9: The nutating washing machine cleaned the clothes thoroughly.
meanings.sent10: The nutating fan kept the room cool during the hot summer.
